reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress chic and well-made, appreciating its thick fabric that's warm without being too heavy. The fit receives positive feedback, with one customer noting it accommodates an umbilical hernia belt, and they find it comfortable and flattering. The length receives mixed reviews, with some finding it nice while others say it's too long, particularly noting it's geared towards short-waisted people.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Zesica Fall Fashion Turtleneck Dress -Black
items.body: As a petite female, I have been a fan of Zesica’s clothing line for a couple of yrs now. The length of this dress is perfect for my 5’2” height. The top to waist is comfortably fitted while not tight or loose. The sleeves also are a perfect length while the skirt section is flowy. The black dress is exactly as pictured-a dark Halloweeny black- not old or worn looking. The turtleneck fits comfortably and does not feel like it’s chocking you. As the cool fall weather comes in this dress is toasty with a heavier sweater/ skirt than what is not so easily found often. Great quality and I will wear this into the winter. Read more
items.author: Maureen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars No pockets, but still amazing
items.body: My dog loves towels. After I shower he gets to play with his towel as a reward for waiting patiently. Towels are his favorite thing. But this is about a dress! I hear you say. And to that I say my dog treated this dress the way he treats towels. He was upset I was wearing it and he didn't get a new towel of his own. He wanted to be under the skirt so he could experience the towel and that's saying something because he's 125 lbs of muscle. It was long and full so we both fit. The material is about as think as those microfiber towels and nice and soft. I have fibromyalgia and feel the clothes I wear so comfortable clothes is my top priority. It wasn't too thick, but it was good quality material. There weren't any sheer spots or anything. It looked fabulous. Like, the guys at work noticed it was new and complimented it as the perfect style for me fabulous. More importantly, I loved the way it looked. If this dress had pockets I would buy it in five colors and make it my official work uniform. If there is a version with pockets I'd love to know! Normally I wouldn't make a no-pocket dress a favorite, but its so comfortable and stylish I'll make an exception. Read more
items.author: MacD

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress! 5 stars.
items.body: I’m 5’7”, and wanted to wear this dress to work, with boots. This dress is AWESOME- it fits like a glove, super comfortable, flattering, warm, and flowy. The color is rich and it’s everything that I wanted. Read more
items.author: ZG

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks more expensive than it is ~
items.body: This is adorable! Nice material. Fits true to size. I don't love the belt - it's too narrow. I replaced it with a leather belt from my closet about twice the size of the original. Read more
items.author: Rebecca Faoro

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars CLASSIC AND BEAUTIFUL!
items.body: This sweater dress is the perfect length and the material is soft and comfortable. It is a very classic look. I love, love this dress. Most sweater dresses I have purchased are thin and clingy. This is just the opposite. Beautiful and elegant design! Read more
items.author: Carilyn F.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic dress
items.body: Love this dress! It’s so comfortable and stretchy, a great length. Wore it out to lunch after church and was stopped and complimented on it. It’s slim/fitted enough that you can wear a sweater if needed but it’s plenty warm on its own. It fit as expected. Read more
items.author: Me

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Dress!!!!!
items.body: True to size, very comfortable dress. I received compliments. Great fall/winter dress not too heavy yet warm enough. I paired it with some boots!! Will buy in other colors!!! Highly recommend very nice fabric!!!! Read more
items.author: S. Rozier

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good quality
items.body: I really liked the color combination, but it didn't quite fit my body shape. The quality is good, and it fits true to size. The fabric is very stretchy at the bottom. Read more
items.author: Jean C.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Khaki, Pink, Eggplant, Apricot, Black, Teal, Dusty Blue, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
